text: Arinze Stanley Egbengwu (born 1993) is a Nigerian artist, activist, photographer, engineer, and entrepreneur. He is best known for creating hyperrealistic pencil drawings. Working primarily with charcoal and graphite on paper, Arinze uses his works as a medium for social and political activism. His work addresses matters including racism, modern slavery, and feminism both in his community and worldwide. == Early life == Arinze was born on 20 November, 1993. He is a self-taught artist and lives in Lagos, Nigeria. In 2014, Arinze graduated from Imo State University with a Bachelor's of Engineering in agricultural engineering. == References == * * * * http://www.thisiscolossal.com/2017/03/arinze-stanley-hyperrealistic-portraits/ Category:1993 births Category:Nigerian artists Category:Hyperrealist artists Category:Living people
title: Arinze Stanley Egbengwu
